pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, December 5, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Media appearances

12:10 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on ICI Radio-Canada Première’s Les faits d’abord.

8:10 p.m. A video message from the Prime Minister will air on CTV’s The Original Santa Claus Parade.
